author: TakeToNews
post:
Impressive @OneCrnaGora network. 
While at 5,300 meters, I received an SMS. Wait, what? An SMS? But we are too high! Confirmation: 17,620 feet = 5,300 meters. 
@proximus’ network in Charleroi was caught only at ± 1,000 feet = 300 meters. 
Note: Nikšić’s altitude is 647 m.
